answerText: Jorge Francisco Isidoro Luis Borges[10] This Spanish author of Mazurka for Two Dead Men was forced to publish The Hive, in Beunos Aires.

subject: Literature
question: Question: name these authors connected to Argentina. [10] He reviewed several fictional works in his "Survey of the Works of Herbert Quain" and wrote about an infinite number of 410 page books in "The Library of Babel", both of which are set in his collection Ficciones.
